title: Picks and Bans Dodge
body:
Guys, It is unfair to dodge a game and be punished... I mean, I had to dodge coz one player was already trolling (saying he was going to troll, banning on of our pick...)

Are we going to see the day where Riot will be ablo to balance the game rules?

replies.body:
While it does seem unfair to gave no escape from a game lost in champ-select.
And as a community we should be working with Riot to find a way around this, but...

If you could dodge with no re-purcussions, I'd just dodge again and again until I got myself in mid, with a Vayne/Draven ADC, Alistar Support, Lee/Hecarim Jungle, Yasuo top. Id also dodge every time the other team gets those champions. 

Why settle for a game where your team picks sub-optimal champs, when you can just dodge until you get a perfect team?

_(I personally wouldn't actually dodge those situations, but you see what I mean.)_

No one would ever get put in a game.

Its not a perfect system, but its the best we have so far.
if u dodge frequently you'll obviously be punished but once every 2 weeks nahhhh
